description: The Shagbark Hickory (Carya ovata) is a truly remarkable tree. Its shaggy bark provides a unique and beautiful texture to the landscape, and its pecan-flavored nuts are highly sought after. Its rugged, long-lasting timber is suitable for many applications, including furniture, flooring and tool handles. In addition to its ornamental and utilitarian value, Shagbark Hickory is desirable for its hardiness and resistance to pests and disease. It is tolerant of various soil and weather conditions, and the tree blossoms with fall-colored foliage. This hearty species is definitely worth its weight in gold, and a great addition to any landscape.
